# bounds

**Instance Property**

The maximum size, in points, of the image associated with the media item artwork.

## Declaration

```swift
var bounds: CGRect { get }
```

## Using a media item image

- **image(at:)**: Returns the artwork image for an item at the given size.

items.description: Returns the artwork image for an item at the given size.
items.name: image(at:)

title: bounds
